overview: A family that lives in a population of just over ten thousand inhabitants and about thirty minutes from Barcelona, sees its everyday life shaken by the political events that take place in Catalonia during the months of September and October 2017. A story of maturation and care. A story of a family that learns to break up and separate without hurting each other and without causing trauma. A family that learns to understand the thoughts and attitudes of others as everything gets more and more tense outside their home. A family that does everything possible to talk and understand each other, because, deep down, they love and respect each other. A family that will find a way to forgive and heal the wounds produced throughout this process.
title: Alguns dies d'ahir
